dmca.title: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Dana Hanson, Learning Strategies [mailto:DanaH@LearningStrategies.com]

Sent: Thursday, December 22, 2005 5:56 PM
To: Legal Response; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM

Dear Legal Response Team,

Thanks for your response, but you are wrong.

Visit this website, advertised on Google by Karina Kronkalne, whom you are
hosting:

http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/achievement.html

Now, visit our legitimate website.

http://www.learningstrategies.com/Consistent/Home.html

Ms. Kronkalne is infringing on our copyrights on this and two other product
pages of ours:

http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/mindset.html
http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/genius.html

I request that you investigate this site and pull it down if necessary.

Sincerely,

Dana Hanson
Customer Service and Success Coaching

Learning Strategies Corporation -
2000 Plymouth Road - Minnetonka, Minnesota  55305-2335 USA 952-476-9200 -
800-735-8273 - Fax 952-475-2373 - http://www.LearningStrategies.com


> From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
> Date: Fri, 16 Dec 2005 14:49:12 -0600
> To: <DanaH@LearningStrategies.com>
> Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
> Subject: FW: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM
> 
> To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
> 
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.
> 
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
> 
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
> 
> -----Original Message-----

>

>

> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

> Begin forwarded message:
> 
>> From: "Dana Hanson, Learning Strategies"
>> <DanaH@LearningStrategies.com>
>> Date: December 15, 2005 3:51:36 PM CST
>> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>> Subject: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM
>> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>> 
>> To whom may concern:
>> 
>> You are currently hosting GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM (67.18.86.95), 
>> registered to Karina Kronkalne.  On this site are the following three
>> pages:
>> 
>> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/achievement.html)
>> 
>> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/mindset.html)
>> 
>> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/genius.html)
>> 
>> These mimic our legitimate web pages at http:// 
>> www.learningstrategies.com .
>> 
>> Ms. Kronkalne is not an affiliate of ours and and has repeatedly 
>> ignored our request to cease and desist.  The email address listed on 
>> her site is not valid and the address listed in whois is also not 
>> valid.
>> 
>> I request that you investigate this site and pull it down if 
>> necessary.
>> 
>> Contact me with any questions. 952-767-9838 or 
>> DanaH@LearningStrategies.com
>> 
>> Sincerely,
>>
